column1: Les différentes parties du paragraphe (5 underscore si trou --> "_____")
From what i've seen, you do have a problem with

. It's very probably related to your current state of boredom and, let's say it, loneliness. Ring your family to tell them about it. Keep. On. Calling. Do not give up. They’re surely the best ones to talk about it. A random stranger like me doesn’t have much power, I’m afraid.
